titles.title: 140 Hail The Day That Sees Him Rise (familiar tune

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hail the day that sees Him rise
Alleluia
to His throne above the skies
Alleluia
Christ the Lamb for sinners giv'n
Alleluia
Enter now trhe highest heaven
Alleluia

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There the glorious triumph waits
Alleluia
Lift your heads eternal gates
Alleluia
Christ hat conquered death and sin
Alleluia
Take the King of glory in
Alleluia

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
See He lifts His hands above
Alleluia
See He shows the prints of love
Alleluia
Hark - His gracious lips bestow
Alleluia
Blessings on His chrch below
Alleluia

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ever upward let us move
Alleluia
Wafted on the wings of love
Alleluia
Lokking when our Lord shal come
Alleluia
Longing gasping after home
Alleluia

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There we shall with Thee remain
Alleluia
Partners of Thy endless reign
Alleluia
There Thy face unclouded see
Alleluia
Find our heav'n of heav'ns in Thee
Alleluia
